create-storybook.description: A schematics to easily add Storybook to your Angular CLI project.

update-storybook.description: A schematics to update existing components in your Storybook;

add-component.description: A schematics to add a component to your Storybook

remove-component.description: A schematics to remove a component from your Storybook.

addon.description: A schematics to add core or community addons to the Storybook.
